body_html: For documentation's sake, I've looked into this briefly and this is what seems to be happening here: when the profile is created, the location (pulled from github?) is added to the “city” field in the profile, but the country is left blank. This causes a validation error (user can't be saved because country is blank) causing some impossible-logging-in-loop-of-doom. Because the profile isn't saved, the user isn't logged in and hence, not allowed to fill out/edit their own profile. Because the profile doesn't get saved, it also doesn't send a confirmation email.
